mapper.select: SELECT log.log_id, log.log_type, log.log_location, log.dp, log.date, log.appeal_id, log.remark, log.student_id, log.teacher_id FROM log LEFT JOIN appeal ON log.appeal_id = appeal.appeal_id WHERE log.student_id = #{userId} AND ((appeal.appeal_status is null) or appeal.appeal_status != 3) GROUP BY log.log_id;

select log_type as type, log_location as location, a.appeal_id as id, dp, date, a.appeal_reason as reason, s.student_name as studentName, s.student_class as studentClass from log left join dp_management.appeal a on log.appeal_id = a.appeal_id left join dp_management.student s on log.student_id = s.student_id where a.appeal_status = 1

SELECT l.log_type, l.log_location, l.date, l.dp, c.class_name, c.class_level, s.student_name FROM log l JOIN student s ON l.student_id = s.student_id JOIN class c ON s.student_class = c.class_name LEFT JOIN appeal a ON l.appeal_id = a.appeal_id WHERE a.appeal_status != 2 OR a.appeal_status IS NULL

SELECT l.log_type, l.log_location, l.date, l.dp, s.student_name, c.class_name FROM log l JOIN student s ON l.student_id = s.student_id JOIN class c ON s.student_class = c.class_name LEFT JOIN appeal a ON l.appeal_id = a.appeal_id WHERE (a.appeal_status != 2 OR a.appeal_status IS NULL) AND c.class_name = (SELECT c.class_name FROM class c LEFT JOIN teacher t ON t.teacher_class = c.class_name WHERE t.teacher_id = #{userId})
